tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RealTimeWeatherData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location TEXT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data ( 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  temperature FLOAT, 
  humidity FLOAT, 
  wind_speed FLOAT, 
  forecast VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE forecast_predictions ( 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  prediction_date DATE, 
  temperature_prediction FLOAT, 
  humidity_prediction FLOAT, 
  wind_speed_prediction FLOAT, 
  confidence_level FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE historical_weather_data ( 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  date DATE, 
  temperature FLOAT, 
  humidity FLOAT, 
  wind_speed FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE forecast_accuracy ( 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  prediction_date DATE, 
  actual_temperature FLOAT, 
  actual_humidity FLOAT, 
  actual_wind_speed FLOAT, 
  error_margin FLOAT 
);
